EnumPrinter

Simplifies the construction of description and debugDescription properties for PrintableEnum and DebugPrintableEnum implementors.

  • description(_:)

    Returns a string suitable for the description property of the specified PrintableEnum.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func description(printEnum: PrintableEnum) -> String

    Parameters

    printEnum

    The PrintableEnum instance for which the description is desired.

    Return Value

    The description string

  • description(_:)

    Returns a string suitable for the description property of the specified PrintableEnum.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func description(printEnum: PrintableAssociatedValueEnum) -> String

    Parameters

    printEnum

    The PrintableEnum instance for which the description is desired.

    Return Value

    The description string

  • debugDescription(_:)

    Returns a string suitable for the debugDescription property of the specified PrintableEnum.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func debugDescription(printEnum: PrintableEnum) -> String

    Parameters

    printEnum

    The PrintableEnum instance for which the debug description is desired.

    Return Value

    The debug description string
